Description: CloudFormation template for a generic VPC with public and private subnets (with private network Internet access via NAT)

NatKeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the NAT instances
NatKeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

PrivateInstanceOS.Description: Enter OS type [amazon, centos or ubuntu]

PublicInstanceOS.Description: Enter OS type [amazon, centos or ubuntu]

PublicInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

PublicKeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the Private instances
PublicKeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

PrivateInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

PrivateKeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the Private instances
PrivateKeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

Fn::Join: yum update -y && yum install -y yum-cron && chkconfig yum-cron on
